Prairie Dog

This inventively-named pattern is a type of modal dialog box that pops out from the edge of a containing element, with an overlay obscuring the rest of that containing element's contents. It's useful for displaying modal utilities related to a specific region of a page. Its API and plugin conventions mimic those of Bootstrap's JavaScript components.

Dialog!

Take root and flourish great turbulent clouds. Apollonius of Perga rich in heavy atoms star stuff harvesting star light Cambrian explosion. Extraordinary claims require extraordinary evidence made in the interiors of collapsing stars? Another world galaxies Apollonius of Perga, birth how far away the carbon in our apple pies at the edge of forever citizens of distant epochs. Permanence of the stars! Decipherment hearts of the stars preserve and cherish that pale blue dot, rogue billions upon billions star stuff harvesting star light rich in heavy atoms take root and flourish. At the edge of forever Tunguska event a billion trillion, Euclid!

<div class="u-margin">
  <button class="btn btn-primary" data-toggle="prairie-dog" data-target="#prairie-dog-demo" type="button">Toggle dialog</button>
</div>

<div class="prairie-dog box-full box-sheer box-lighter">
  <div class="prairie-dog-dialog" id="prairie-dog-demo">
    <div class="u-margin clearfix text-center">
      Dialog!
      <button class="btn btn-default" data-dismiss="prairie-dog" aria-label="Close">&times;</button>
    </div>
  </div>
  <div class="prairie-dog-overlay"></div>
  <div class="box-inner prairie-dog-bg">
    <p>Take root and flourish great turbulent clouds. Apollonius of Perga rich in heavy atoms star stuff harvesting star light Cambrian explosion. Extraordinary claims require extraordinary evidence made in the interiors of collapsing stars? Another world galaxies Apollonius of Perga, birth how far away the carbon in our apple pies at the edge of forever citizens of distant epochs. Permanence of the stars! Decipherment hearts of the stars preserve and cherish that pale blue dot, rogue billions upon billions star stuff harvesting star light rich in heavy atoms take root and flourish. At the edge of forever Tunguska event a billion trillion, Euclid!</p>
  </div>
</div>

Responsive Prairie Dog

Because prairie dog modals are particularly useful when space is at a premium, they support being applied for specific breakpoints only.

Dialog at small sizes
Sidebar at large sizes

Take root and flourish great turbulent clouds. Apollonius of Perga rich in heavy atoms star stuff harvesting star light Cambrian explosion. Extraordinary claims require extraordinary evidence made in the interiors of collapsing stars? Another world galaxies Apollonius of Perga, birth how far away the carbon in our apple pies at the edge of forever citizens of distant epochs. Permanence of the stars! Decipherment hearts of the stars preserve and cherish that pale blue dot, rogue billions upon billions star stuff harvesting star light rich in heavy atoms take root and flourish. At the edge of forever Tunguska event a billion trillion, Euclid!

<div class="u-margin hidden-md hidden-lg">
  <button class="btn btn-primary" data-toggle="prairie-dog" data-target="#prairie-dog-demo-responsive" type="button">Toggle dialog</button>
</div>

<div class="prairie-dog-xs prairie-dog-sm container-fluid box-full box-sheer box-lighter" id="prairie-dog-demo-responsive-wrapper">
  <div class="prairie-dog-dialog col-md-3" id="prairie-dog-demo-responsive" data-parent="#prairie-dog-demo-responsive-wrapper">
    <div class="u-margin clearfix text-center">
      <div class="visible-xs-block visible-sm-block">
        Dialog at small sizes
        <button class="btn btn-default hidden-md hidden-lg" data-dismiss="prairie-dog" aria-label="Close">&times;</button>
      </div>
      <div class="hidden-xs hidden-sm">
        Sidebar at large sizes
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
  <div class="prairie-dog-overlay"></div>
  <div class="col-md-9 prairie-dog-bg box-inner">
    <p>Take root and flourish great turbulent clouds. Apollonius of Perga rich in heavy atoms star stuff harvesting star light Cambrian explosion. Extraordinary claims require extraordinary evidence made in the interiors of collapsing stars? Another world galaxies Apollonius of Perga, birth how far away the carbon in our apple pies at the edge of forever citizens of distant epochs. Permanence of the stars! Decipherment hearts of the stars preserve and cherish that pale blue dot, rogue billions upon billions star stuff harvesting star light rich in heavy atoms take root and flourish. At the edge of forever Tunguska event a billion trillion, Euclid!</p>
  </div>
</div>
